field_body.value:
The Image Gallery component allows you to quickly create an image gallery or slideshow. 
We have two modes for Gallery component with simple configuration
i) Simple Gallery: it will generate a collection of thumbnails from the images from Media Assets. 
ii) Gallery Carousel: it will generate a slideshow or a collection of thumbnails from the images from Media Assets. When a thumbnail is clicked, the image viewer changes to display the selected picture.
field_body.processed:
The Image Gallery component allows you to quickly create an image gallery or slideshow. 
We have two modes for Gallery component with simple configuration
i) Simple Gallery: it will generate a collection of thumbnails from the images from Media Assets. 
ii) Gallery Carousel: it will generate a slideshow or a collection of thumbnails from the images from Media Assets. When a thumbnail is clicked, the image viewer changes to display the selected picture.
